metadata.Title: CVE-2023-4527 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in glibc. When the getaddrinfo function is called with theAF_UNSPEC address family and the system is configured with no-aaaa mode via/etc/resolv.conf, a DNS response via TCP larger than 2048 bytes canpotentially disclose stack contents through the function returned addressdata, and may cause a crash.

criterions.comment: glibc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
